name: spesbcd
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wex(s0, w1), wsbc(s0, c0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), wex(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w1), wex(s0, w1))

|- wi(w0, wex(s0, w1))
-| wi(w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w1))

comment: form of ~ spsbc . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2017.)
